channel.title: Painterly Pack
channel.description: the painterly pack lets u creat ur own pack from a selection from a list for each thing u could use! it's also compatible for the 1.0.0 version. it's really cool and the selection you can choose from is pretty cool too!

item.title: Painterly Pack
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

omgilikepie:

Painterly Pack? :o Never heard of it. But yea…then again…I don’t mess with them because my computer can’t handle them most of the time lol.

my point exactly ehp, now as it is completly customizable to ur tastes, and therefore attuned to ur sort of awesomeness, it will produce a smidge lag, so adjusting render may be in order, or just use optifine with it.

Read full topic
